fields.text: Welcome to Netlify in San Francisco, your all-in-one platform for deploying modern static websites.
To learn about our platform features and integrations, press [INDEX].
For details on continuous deployment, CDN, and one-click HTTPS, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a platform specialist.
For information on pricing options and our free plan, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing details.
If you are an existing customer needing assistance, press [INDEX].
For technical support with your deployments, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.
For billing and account inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.
